description:
Cushy, supportive insoles designed to fit trail running, hiking and skiing footwear. A combination of full-length EVA foam and composite heel plates provides a secure stable platform, delivering better shock absorption to reduce foot, ankle, knee and back pain. Green insoles can also improve shoe fit too, so you end up with less muscle fatigue after a long day on your feet.

  • Forefoot cushion pads
  • Wide and deep heel offers maximum support
  • High profile shape stabilizes your foot
  • Antimicrobial treatment
  • Sizes shown are men's US
name: Superfeet All-Purpose Support High Arch (Green) - Unisex
